mapper.sql: FROM SUBJECT A INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT B ON (A.DEPT_NO = B.DEPT_NO) INNER JOIN COLLEAGE C ON (B.COL_NO = C.COL_NO) INNER JOIN COMM D ON (A.SUB_COMM = D.COMM_NO) INNER JOIN COMM E ON (A.SUB_STATE = E.COMM_NO)
FROM FAVORITES F INNER JOIN SUBJECT S ON (F.SUB_NO = S.SUB_NO) INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (S.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO) INNER JOIN COMM C ON (S.SUB_COMM = C.COMM_NO) WHERE MEM_NO = #{memNo}
mapper.select: SELECT G.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,F.* FROM( SELECT A.SUB_NO, B.DEPT_NAME, C.COL_NAME, A.SUB_NAME, A.SUB_GRADE, A.SUB_SCR, A.SUB_HOURS, D.COMM_NAME FROM SUBJECT A LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT B ON (A.DEPT_NO=B.DEPT_NO) LEFT JOIN COLLEAGE C ON (A.COL_NO=C.COL_NO) LEFT JOIN COMM D ON (A.SUB_COMM=D.COMM_NO) WHERE SUB_STATE='B002'AND A.SUB_NO NOT IN (SELECT SUB_NO FROM FAVORITES) )F )G
mapper.insert:
SELECT 'CR'||LPAD(MY_CURRI_SEQ.NEXTVAL,3,0) FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO CURRI ( CURRI_NO, CURRI_DESIGNER, CURRI_NAME, CURRI_RDATE ) VALUES( #{curriNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{curriDesigner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{curriName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )

SELECT 'CD'||LPAD(CURRI_DETAIL_SEQ.NEXTVAL,3,0) FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO CURRI_DETAIL (CD_NO, SUB_NO, CURRI_NO, CD_PRIORITY ) VALUES( #{cdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{curriNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdPriority,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT G.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,F.* FROM(SELECT CURRI_NO,CURRI_NAME,CURRI_RDATE FROM CURRI WHERE CURRI_DESIGNER = #{curriDesigner} )F )G

SELECT A.CD_NO,A.CD_PRIORITY,A.CURRI_NO,A.SUB_NO,C.SUB_NAME,D.COMM_NAME FROM CURRI_DETAIL A LEFT JOIN CURRI B ON(A.CURRI_NO = B.CURRI_NO) LEFT JOIN SUBJECT C ON(A.SUB_NO =C.SUB_NO) LEFT JOIN COMM D ON(C.SUB_COMM=D.COMM_NO) WHERE B.CURRI_NO =#{curriNo} ORDER BY A.CD_PRIORITY

SELECT A.SUB_NO,A.DEPT_NO,C.COL_NAME, B.CD_NO,B.CD_PRIORITY, A.SUB_NAME,A.SUB_EXP,A.SUB_GRADE, A.SUB_HOURS,A.SUB_SCR,D.COMM_NAME, A.SUB_STATE,A.SUB_REASON,B.CURRI_NO FROM SUBJECT A LEFT JOIN CURRI_DETAIL B ON(A.SUB_NO = B.SUB_NO) LEFT JOIN COLLEAGE C ON(A.COL_NO=C.COL_NO) LEFT JOIN COMM D ON(A.SUB_COMM=D.COMM_NO) WHERE A.SUB_NO = #{subNo} AND B.CURRI_NO = #{curriNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CURRI_DETAIL WHERE CD_NO IN (SELECT CD_NO FROM CURRI_DETAIL A LEFT JOIN SUBJECT B ON A.SUB_NO = B.SUB_NO WHERE CD_NO = #{cdNo})
mapper.select: SELECT G.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,F.* FROM( SELECT C.DEPT_NAME, B.SUB_NO, B.SUB_NAME, D.COMM_NAME, B.SUB_GRADE, B.SUB_SCR, SUB_HOURS FROM FAVORITES A LEFT JOIN SUBJECT B ON (A.SUB_NO = B.SUB_NO) LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT C ON(B.DEPT_NO=C.DEPT_NO) LEFT JOIN COMM D ON(B.SUB_COMM = D.COMM_NO) WHERE MEM_NO = #{memNo} )F )G ORDER BY G.RNUM
